details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.1 General - Struct element parent
details.description: Struct element shall contain the P entry according to ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.7.2, Table 355

rule.description: A struct element shall contain the P entry according to ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.7.2, Table 355

error.message: A struct element does not contain the P entry
